channel.title: Fantasy Kingdom (coming soon for Final Fantasy Kingdom
channel.description:
Hello all, I wanted to see what everyone thought of my project thus far. I started it with very little experience in coding games, and a whole lot of experience coding websites. I was tired of playing games that had a singular town packed full of one shop right after the other, one skill town devoted to every skill there was (And so many of them missing) and nothing really to do otherwise. So in November I got a hold of a delta server, and began. At first I was knowledgeable on very little past what was in the client, clickingmost (some) and autospawning and door opening lol. From then until now, I have discovered quite a bit and learned a lot. I wanted to share what has been accomplished to get some feedback from people who actually work on and or play these servers. Friends feedback is good and all but they always try to be "overly nice" and most my friends have never played these or RS.
~Skills~ Mining - 90% - essence (in the essence mine) - clay - copper - tin - iron - limestone - gem rocks (Random gems are mined) - silver - steel - elemental - coal - gold - mithril - Rune Not complete - Inspecting the rocks - running out of ore - possibly pickaxe level req
Agility - 75% Courses available are: - Gnome - Barbarian - wilderness - Ape Atoll - Werewolf - pyramid - Yanille Basement Not complete - Brimhaven Agility course - course ticket - proper course completion reward??
Smithing - 95% - 100% smelting with interface (1, 5, & 10 ores) - 100% coal requirement - 100% working elemental workshop - 100% smithing with interface - 100% gold smithing with molds - 100% silver smithing with molds Not complete - Have not discovered how to smelt the X-amount in the smelting interface as of now.
Herblore - 100% - 100% unfinished potions - 100% Unfinished potions + 2nd ingredient
Fishing - 85% Fish are fished all over the game, needing the proper item to fish them. Fish include: - shrimp - karambwanji - herring - anchovies - mackerel - trout - cod - pike - salmon - tuna - lobster - bass - swordfish - monkfish - shark (Fishing Guild only) - Sea Turtle & Manta Ray (Donator only) Not complete - Fishing trawler event - randomly getting anchovies rather than fishing for them
Crafting - 100%??? Crafting includes: - 100% Gem cutting all gems - 100% jewelry making - 100% gold smelting with molds - 100% necklace and amulet stringing - 100% pottery crafting - 100% spinning - 100% leather tanning - 100% leather, d-hide, and snakeskin crafting - 100% glassblowing - 100% Crafting tiaras using talismans - Charging orbs (Not done through magic spells yet) - 100% Combining orbs with battlestaffs - 100% Crab armor
Cooking - 90% All foods being able to be cooked on player made fires, some being only able to cook this way. - 100% all meats - 100% all fish catch-able - 100% breadmaking - 100% cakes - 100% all pies - 100% stews - 100% potato toppings - 100% potato types - 100% Churning (Cream, butter, & cheese) - 100% wine - All cooked items are also edible, and give a set amount of HP back. Not complete - burning items randomly - all beers (liquors)
Runecrafting - 100% - 100% runecrafting ALL runes - 100% proper combo runecrafting - 100% Working Talismans and Tiaras - 100% Working Abyss region
Firemaking - 95% - 100% all logs catch fire Not complete - player does not move a space when the fire starts.
Woodcutting - 85% - 100% all trees cut Not compelete - do not make stumps after a set time - No random tree cutting events
Fletching - 85% (lack of items in game) - 100% log fletching - 100% arrow making - 100% bow stringing Not complete - tips cannot be made due to them not being in the game
Farming - 60% - 100% flowers - 100% bushes - 100% trees - 100% allotments - 100% fruit trees - 65% hops - 50% herbs - 65% patch raking - 100% watering and growing - 100% herb identification Not complete - No timer for watering, growing or raking - plants do not randomly become diseased or die - compost is not yet needed - herbs do not pick the proper way - hops grow and can be planted but do not pick (Reason unknown) - growth will not continue if you leave area or log out
Slayer - 80% - 100% tasks Not complete - Slayer Dungeon - other slayer masters
Attack, Defence, Magic, Strength, Range, Prayer, 95% Not complete - Charge orbs do not work atm. You have to do it by using the orb on the obelisk
~Other Notables~ - 100% weapon specs - Full Donator Zone with tons of benefits - Home is E. Ardounge - Player Chill Zone - Staff Zone
~Notable dungeons open~ - Waterbirth Dungeon 100% - Underground Pass 100% - Desert Pyramid 100% - Taverly Dungeon 100% - Iban's tomb 100% - Ikov 100% - edgeville dungeon 100% - Ardounge sewers 100% - Clocktower dungeon??? 100% - Some others, but Idk the names
~Mini-Games (if you call them that)~ - 65% Castlewars - 100% Duel Arena - 50% Fit Pits - % unknown Jad - % unknown Pest Control
~Transportation~ - 100% sailing (No interface) - 100% Gnome Glider - 80% Lum River Canoe (Do not have to create the canoe) - 100% Spirit Trees - 100% Fairy Ring (Created by Fantasy Kingdom) - 100% Amulet of Glory - Canoe from Mort'ton to the swamp - From the mainland to Piscotaris - Mainland to the fishing platform - 100% Magic carpets in the desert
Honestly I am not sure what else there is I have done since I began 4 months ago. It is not available to play yet. (Sorry) It is scheduled to release on my website to coincide with Final Fantasy Kingdoms 7th anniversary (12-19-12)
Let me know what you all think. would it sound interesting enough to give it a shot? Am I missing anything from the skills? And just overall feedback on if it is a good go, or a bad one.
For the media (God hoping it works) check out the album I have for it here ( [url=http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.2529471109794.2121570.1043945774&type=3]http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.2529471109794.2121570.1043945774&type=3[/url] ) If this does not work, let me know. I am going to be placing it in my website shortly, and can then link it to there. Thanks for reading through this boring, and hopefully it will interest you! :)

item.title: Fantasy Kingdom (coming soon for Final Fantasy Kingdom
item.dc:creator: @FFkingdom FFkingdom
item.description:
@FFkingdom wrote:

Hello all, I wanted to see what everyone thought of my project thus far. I started it with very little experience in coding games, and a whole lot of experience coding websites. I was tired of playing games that had a singular town packed full of one shop right after the other, one skill town devoted to every skill there was (And so many of them missing) and nothing really to do otherwise. So in November I got a hold of a delta server, and began. At first I was knowledgeable on very little past what was in the client, clickingmost (some) and autospawning and door opening lol. From then until now, I have discovered quite a bit and learned a lot. I wanted to share what has been accomplished to get some feedback from people who actually work on and or play these servers. Friends feedback is good and all but they always try to be “overly nice” and most my friends have never played these or RS.

~Skills~
Mining - 90%

  • essence (in the essence mine)

  • clay

  • copper

  • tin

  • iron

  • limestone

  • gem rocks (Random gems are mined)

  • silver

  • steel

  • elemental

  • coal

  • gold

  • mithril

  • Rune
    Not complete

  • Inspecting the rocks

  • running out of ore

  • possibly pickaxe level req

      Agility - 75%

Courses available are:

  • Gnome

  • Barbarian

  • wilderness

  • Ape Atoll

  • Werewolf

  • pyramid

  • Yanille Basement
    Not complete

  • Brimhaven Agility course

  • course ticket

  • proper course completion reward??

      Smithing - 95%

  • 100% smelting with interface (1, 5, & 10 ores)

  • 100% coal requirement

  • 100% working elemental workshop

  • 100% smithing with interface

  • 100% gold smithing with molds

  • 100% silver smithing with molds
    Not complete

  • Have not discovered how to smelt the X-amount in the smelting interface as of now.

       Herblore - 100%

  • 100% unfinished potions

  • 100% Unfinished potions + 2nd ingredient

       Fishing - 85%

Fish are fished all over the game, needing the proper item to fish them. Fish include:

  • shrimp

  • karambwanji

  • herring

  • anchovies

  • mackerel

  • trout

  • cod

  • pike

  • salmon

  • tuna

  • lobster

  • bass

  • swordfish

  • monkfish

  • shark (Fishing Guild only)

  • Sea Turtle & Manta Ray (Donator only)
    Not complete

  • Fishing trawler event

  • randomly getting anchovies rather than fishing for them

      Crafting - 100%???

Crafting includes:

  • 100% Gem cutting all gems

  • 100% jewelry making

  • 100% gold smelting with molds

  • 100% necklace and amulet stringing

  • 100% pottery crafting

  • 100% spinning

  • 100% leather tanning

  • 100% leather, d-hide, and snakeskin crafting

  • 100% glassblowing

  • 100% Crafting tiaras using talismans

  • Charging orbs (Not done through magic spells yet)

  • 100% Combining orbs with battlestaffs

  • 100% Crab armor

        Cooking - 90%

All foods being able to be cooked on player made fires, some being only able to cook this way.

  • 100% all meats

  • 100% all fish catch-able

  • 100% breadmaking

  • 100% cakes

  • 100% all pies

  • 100% stews

  • 100% potato toppings

  • 100% potato types

  • 100% Churning (Cream, butter, & cheese)

  • 100% wine

  • All cooked items are also edible, and give a set amount of HP back.
    Not complete

  • burning items randomly

  • all beers (liquors)

         Runecrafting - 100%

  • 100% runecrafting ALL runes

  • 100% proper combo runecrafting

  • 100% Working Talismans and Tiaras

  • 100% Working Abyss region

        Firemaking - 95%

  • 100% all logs catch fire
    Not complete

  • player does not move a space when the fire starts.

        Woodcutting - 85%

  • 100% all trees cut
    Not compelete

  • do not make stumps after a set time

  • No random tree cutting events

        Fletching - 85% (lack of items in game)

  • 100% log fletching

  • 100% arrow making

  • 100% bow stringing
    Not complete

  • tips cannot be made due to them not being in the game

       Farming - 60%

  • 100% flowers

  • 100% bushes

  • 100% trees

  • 100% allotments

  • 100% fruit trees

  • 65% hops

  • 50% herbs

  • 65% patch raking

  • 100% watering and growing

  • 100% herb identification
    Not complete

  • No timer for watering, growing or raking

  • plants do not randomly become diseased or die

  • compost is not yet needed

  • herbs do not pick the proper way

  • hops grow and can be planted but do not pick (Reason unknown)

  • growth will not continue if you leave area or log out

        Slayer - 80%

  • 100% tasks
    Not complete

  • Slayer Dungeon

  • other slayer masters

        Attack, Defence, Magic, Strength, Range, Prayer, 95%

Not complete - Charge orbs do not work atm. You have to do it by using the orb on the obelisk

~Other Notables~

  • 100% weapon specs
  • Full Donator Zone with tons of benefits
  • Home is E. Ardounge
  • Player Chill Zone
  • Staff Zone

~Notable dungeons open~

  • Waterbirth Dungeon 100%
  • Underground Pass 100%
  • Desert Pyramid 100%
  • Taverly Dungeon 100%
  • Iban’s tomb 100%
  • Ikov 100%
  • edgeville dungeon 100%
  • Ardounge sewers 100%
  • Clocktower dungeon??? 100%
  • Some others, but Idk the names

~Mini-Games (if you call them that)~

  • 65% Castlewars
  • 100% Duel Arena
  • 50% Fit Pits
  • % unknown Jad
  • % unknown Pest Control

~Transportation~

  • 100% sailing (No interface)
  • 100% Gnome Glider
  • 80% Lum River Canoe (Do not have to create the canoe)
  • 100% Spirit Trees
  • 100% Fairy Ring (Created by Fantasy Kingdom)
  • 100% Amulet of Glory
  • Canoe from Mort’ton to the swamp
  • From the mainland to Piscotaris
  • Mainland to the fishing platform
  • 100% Magic carpets in the desert

Honestly I am not sure what else there is I have done since I began 4 months ago. It is not available to play yet. (Sorry) It is scheduled to release on my website to coincide with Final Fantasy Kingdoms 7th anniversary (12-19-12)

Let me know what you all think. would it sound interesting enough to give it a shot? Am I missing anything from the skills? And just overall feedback on if it is a good go, or a bad one.

For the media (God hoping it works) check out the album I have for it here ( http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.2529471109794.2121570.1043945774&type=3 )
If this does not work, let me know. I am going to be placing it in my website shortly, and can then link it to there.
Thanks for reading through this boring, and hopefully it will interest you!
